resources.string: Enter a title for the session and click one of the \'Create\' buttons.
Click the button to start the session. Click again to start/stop each recording. Use the MENU to stop the session.
Click the button to start/stop each recording. Use the MENU to stop the session.

Session mode allows you to record multiple voice/audio annotations during an event. Such a documented event is called a session. Click \'Document New Session\' to create a new session and record annotations. You may also click on an existing session to review its annotations, or long-press for more options.

In simple mode, you can start/stop recording any time, and access the recordings from the list. Click on a recording to listen. Long-press to edit the recording\'s label. Use the MENU to e-mail all of the recordings.
Click on an annotation below to listen. Long-press to edit the annotation\'s label. Use the MENU to e-mail the session.
